item.title: SleepyHolder - HITCON CTF 2016
item.description: Linux GLIBC Heap Exploitation of a Use-after-Free Waking Sleepy Holder up ... Hey! Do you have any secret? I can help you to hold your secrets, and no one will be able to see it :) 1. Keep secret 2. Wipe secret 3. Renew secret This challenge involves three chunks of three different sizes, a fastbin size 0x30, a large bin size 0xfb0 and a chunk of size 0x61a80 which gets allocated in a newly maped region.
